definition: He who gives no thought to far-flung problems soon finds suffering nearby (idiom, from Analects)./Smug concentration on the here and now will lead to future sorrow.
pinyin: ren2 wu2 yuan3 lu:4 , bi4 you3 jin4 you1

definition: man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
to distance oneself from (classical)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to think over/to consider/anxiety
certainly/must/will/necessarily
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
near/close to/approximately
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
long-term considerations/to take the long view
to thrive in calamity and perish in soft living (idiom)/life springs from sorrow and calamity, death comes from ease and pleasure
pinyin: sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4

definition: storing grain against a famine/to lay sth by for a rainy day/also written 積穀防飢|积谷防饥
to think of danger in times of safety/to be vigilant in peacetime (idiom)
good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked
pinyin: jun1 zi5 tan3 dang4 dang4 , xiao3 ren2 chang2 qi1 qi1
related.word: 君子坦荡荡，小人长戚戚

definition: lit. not to dig a well until one is thirsty/to be unprepared and seek help at the last minute (idiom)
don't meddle in affairs that are not part of your position (Confucius)
pinyin: bu4 zai4 qi2 wei4 bu4 mou4 qi2 zheng4

definition: planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: see 生於憂患，死於安樂|生于忧患，死于安乐[sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4]
Look out for yourself, or heaven and earth will combine to destroy you./Every man for himself, and the Devil take the hindmost.
pinyin: ren2 bu4 wei4 ji3 , tian1 zhu1 di4 mie4

definition: ancient language/old expression
do not worry about scarcity, but rather about uneven distribution (idiom, from Analects)
pinyin: bu4 huan4 gua3 er2 huan4 bu4 jun1

definition: man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears
lit. a wise person reflecting a thousand times can still make a mistake (idiom); fig. nobody is infallible
pinyin: zhi4 zhe3 qian1 lu:4 , bi4 you3 yi1 shi1

definition: short-sighted
if you are lazy in your prime, you'll be sorry in your old age
pinyin: shao4 zhuang4 bu4 nu3 li4 , lao3 da4 tu2 shang1 bei1
related.word: 少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲
